fields.name: The Barn Nursery
fields.description: This ain’t your baby’s barn! Browse an overwhelming selection of plants and gardening equipment as you explore what is surely the largest barn-themed plant nursery in eastern TN! Highlights include a section dedicated to miniature fairy gardens and a rotating cast of bigger-than-life statues. Tell the Sasquatch Zach says hello!

fields.name: Be Caffeinated
fields.description: Coffee, but with exceptional vibes! The folks at Be Caffeinated have been making a buzz by inviting local artists and musicians to their cozy patio to show off their skills.
